25 #define swap(a, b) { uint8_t t = a; a = b; b = t; }

37 #define WHITE 1

44 #define XOR 1

53 #define SETCONTRAST 0x81
54 #define DISPLAYALLONRESUME 0xA4
55 #define DISPLAYALLON 0xA5
56 #define NORMALDISPLAY 0xA6
57 #define INVERTDISPLAY 0xA7
58 #define DISPLAYOFF 0xAE
59 #define DISPLAYON 0xAF
60 #define SETDISPLAYOFFSET 0xD3
61 #define SETCOMPINS 0xDA
62 #define SETVCOMDESELECT 0xDB
63 #define SETDISPLAYCLOCKDIV 0xD5
64 #define SETPRECHARGE 0xD9
65 #define SETMULTIPLEX 0xA8
66 #define SETLOWCOLUMN 0x00
67 #define SETHIGHCOLUMN 0x10
68 #define SETSTARTLINE 0x40
69 #define MEMORYMODE 0x20
70 #define COMSCANINC 0xC0
71 #define COMSCANDEC 0xC8
72 #define SEGREMAP 0xA0
73 #define CHARGEPUMP 0x8D
74 #define EXTERNALVCC 0x01
75 #define SWITCHCAPVCC 0x02
76 
77 // Scroll
78 #define ACTIVATESCROLL 0x2F
79 #define DEACTIVATESCROLL 0x2E
80 #define SETVERTICALSCROLLAREA 0xA3
81 #define RIGHTHORIZONTALSCROLL 0x26
82 #define LEFT_HORIZONTALSCROLL 0x27
83 #define VERTICALRIGHTHORIZONTALSCROLL 0x29
84 #define VERTICALLEFTHORIZONTALSCROLL 0x2A

86 typedef enum CMD {
87  CMD_CLEAR, //0
88  CMD_INVERT, //1
89  CMD_CONTRAST, //2
90  CMD_DISPLAY, //3
91  CMD_SETCURSOR, //4
92  CMD_PIXEL, //5
93  CMD_LINE, //6
94  CMD_LINEH, //7
95  CMD_LINEV, //8
96  CMD_RECT, //9
97  CMD_RECTFILL, //10
98  CMD_CIRCLE, //11
99  CMD_CIRCLEFILL, //12
100  CMD_DRAWCHAR, //13
101  CMD_DRAWBITMAP, //14
102  CMD_GETLCDWIDTH, //15
103  CMD_GETLCDHEIGHT, //16
104  CMD_SETCOLOR, //17
105  CMD_SETDRAWMODE //18
106 } commCommand_t;

108 class MicroView : public Print{
109 public:

116 
117 //#else
118 // virtual void write(uint8_t);
119 //#endif

122  void command(uint8_t c);
123  void data(uint8_t c);
124  void setColumnAddress(uint8_t add);
125  void setPageAddress(uint8_t add);
126 
127  // LCD Draw functions
128  void clear(uint8_t mode);
129  void clear(uint8_t mode, uint8_t c);
130  void invert(boolean inv);
131  void contrast(uint8_t contrast);

134  void pixel(uint8_t x, uint8_t y);
135  void pixel(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t color, uint8_t mode);
136  void line(uint8_t x0, uint8_t y0, uint8_t x1, uint8_t y1);
137  void line(uint8_t x0, uint8_t y0, uint8_t x1, uint8_t y1, uint8_t color, uint8_t mode);
138  void lineH(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t width);
139  void lineH(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t width, uint8_t color, uint8_t mode);
140  void lineV(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t height);
141  void lineV(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t height, uint8_t color, uint8_t mode);
142  void rect(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t width, uint8_t height);
143  void rect(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t width, uint8_t height, uint8_t color , uint8_t mode);
144  void rectFill(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t width, uint8_t height);
145  void rectFill(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t width, uint8_t height, uint8_t color , uint8_t mode);
146  void circle(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t radius);
147  void circle(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t radius, uint8_t color, uint8_t mode);
148  void circleFill(uint8_t x0, uint8_t y0, uint8_t radius);
149  void circleFill(uint8_t x0, uint8_t y0, uint8_t radius, uint8_t color, uint8_t mode);
150  void drawChar(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t c);
151  void drawChar(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, uint8_t c, uint8_t color, uint8_t mode);
152  void drawBitmap(void);
153  uint8_t getLCDWidth(void);
154  uint8_t getLCDHeight(void);
155  void setColor(uint8_t color);
156  void setDrawMode(uint8_t mode);
157 
158  // Font functions
159  uint8_t getFontWidth(void);
160  uint8_t getFontHeight(void);
161  uint8_t getTotalFonts(void);
162  uint8_t getFontType(void);
163  uint8_t setFontType(uint8_t type);
164  uint8_t getFontStartChar(void);
165  uint8_t getFontTotalChar(void);
166 
167  // LCD Rotate Scroll functions
168  void scrollRight(uint8_t start, uint8_t stop);
169  void scrollLeft(uint8_t start, uint8_t stop);
170  void scrollVertRight(uint8_t start, uint8_t stop);
171  void scrollVertLeft(uint8_t start, uint8_t stop);
172  void scrollStop(void);
173  void flipVertical(boolean flip);
174  void flipHorizontal(boolean flip);
175 
176  // Communication
177  void checkComm(void);
178  void doCmd(uint8_t index);
179 
180 private:
181  //uint8_t cs;
182  //volatile uint8_t *mosiport, *sckport;
183  volatile uint8_t *ssport, *dcport, *ssreg, *dcreg; // use volatile because these are fixed location port address
184  uint8_t mosipinmask, sckpinmask, sspinmask, dcpinmask;
185  uint8_t foreColor,drawMode,fontWidth, fontHeight, fontType, fontStartChar, fontTotalChar, cursorX, cursorY;
186  uint16_t fontMapWidth;
187  //unsigned char *fontsPointer[TOTALFONTS];
188  static const unsigned char *fontsPointer[];
189 
190  int readSerial(void);
191 };

193 class MicroViewWidget {
194 public:
195  MicroViewWidget(uint8_t newx, uint8_t newy, int16_t min, int16_t max);
196  uint8_t getX();
197  uint8_t getY();

199  void setY(uint8_t newy);
200 
201  int16_t getMinValue();
202  int16_t getMaxValue();
203  int16_t getValue();
204  void setMaxValue(int16_t max);
205  void setMinValue(int16_t max);
206  void setValue(int16_t val);
208  virtual void draw(){};
210  virtual void drawFace(){};
211 
212 private:
213  uint8_t x;
214  uint8_t y;
215  int16_t maxValue;
216  int16_t minValue;
217  int16_t value;
218 };

244 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV4 0x00
245 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV16 0x01
246 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV64 0x02
247 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV128 0x03
248 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV2 0x04
249 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV8 0x05
250 #define SPI_CLOCK_DIV32 0x06
251 //#define SPI_CLOCK_DIV64 0x07
252 
253 #define SPI_MODE0 0x00
254 #define SPI_MODE1 0x04
255 #define SPI_MODE2 0x08
256 #define SPI_MODE3 0x0C
257 
258 #define SPI_MODE_MASK 0x0C // CPOL = bit 3, CPHA = bit 2 on SPCR
259 #define SPI_CLOCK_MASK 0x03 // SPR1 = bit 1, SPR0 = bit 0 on SPCR
260 #define SPI_2XCLOCK_MASK 0x01 // SPI2X = bit 0 on SPSR
261 
262 class MVSPIClass {
263 public:
265  inline static byte transfer(byte _data);
266 
267  // SPI Configuration methods
268 
269  inline static void attachInterrupt();
270  inline static void detachInterrupt(); // Default
271 
272  static void begin(); // Default
273  static void end();
274 
275  static void setBitOrder(uint8_t);
276  static void setDataMode(uint8_t);
277  static void setClockDivider(uint8_t);
278 };
279 
280 extern MVSPIClass MVSPI;
281 
282 byte MVSPIClass::transfer(byte _data) {
283  SPDR = _data;
284  while (!(SPSR & _BV(SPIF)))
285  ;
286  return SPDR;
287 }
288 
289 void MVSPIClass::attachInterrupt() {
290  SPCR |= _BV(SPIE);
291 }
292 
293 void MVSPIClass::detachInterrupt() {
294  SPCR &= ~_BV(SPIE);
295 }
296
